website_summaries.verdict: Total capacity may be an issue for larger occasions, but this three-compartment food warmer is great for keeping appetizers or dips or finger foods warm during parties.
pros: Electric model, no liquid or gel fuel required
Holds food at temperature for hours
cons: Thin metal construction, can dent easily

customer_reviews.title: Makes a party much easier and keeps people from "helping" you serve the food.
customer_reviews.text: We gave a party for about 25 people, and this appliance worked very well for moving batches of grits casserole and potato casserole from the big ugly baking pans to the chafing pans and holding the food warm as people grazed. Also worked well for keeping croissants warm but not drying them out. You will need to get a short extension cord...I used large bright masking tape to attach the extension cord to the floor...because the appliance cord is impossibly short. (Thank you so much, OSHA, sarcastically.) A very good addition to party planning, and easy cleanup. I doubt you could run a catering business with it, but for home use it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! We made three hot dishes for Christmas Eve and it worked perfectly. I can't wait to use it for taco night, chili dogs and other parties. Also love that I can remove the top and use my own dishes for other creative presentations. We had no problem keeping the food hot so I don't know why anyone would ever give it less than 5 stars. Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fischman

customer_reviews.title: Does not sustain heat
customer_reviews.text: I heated my Thanksgving potatoes and dressing to the point of being very hot in the microwave before I put it in the warming containers. I had preheated the unit, as per instructions, and I let it heat on a high setting, but if it wasn't for the gravy that came off of the stove, the potatoes and dressing would have been cool. It is attractive, easy to use, but does not do its job. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I am going to order another one
customer_reviews.text: Works great,I am going to order another one, I got this one because I have a big yard sale and I wanted to sell food it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: msmel331

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Tray holder was bent and pans kept fallin, but metal so thin it was easy to bend back into shape. Just not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: MMO

customer_reviews.title: I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product. It works great for the price. The metal square that holds the pans could've been made more sturdy though. It was a little bent when I recieved it but for the price i decided I'd keep it anyway. I would've given 5 stars if it weren't for that.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: The quality is top notch and the heating surface is extremely large. Versatility is prime bc you can remove the 3 entree size servers and use as a hit plate for whatever you like!
customer_reviews.author: The DIY Designer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Used it soon after it came in
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Used it soon after it came in. We will use it every time we host a group for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The inserts are small, but you can remove and use two square trays or one large tray. Works great and keeps the food warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A GIFT FOR MY DAUGHTER-IN-LAW...SHE GIVES LOTS OF PARTIES AND CLAIMS IT IS SUPER
customer_reviews.author: Billie D. Berdon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase. Bought it for a party but will use for Tx, Xmas and other holidays!
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Three single covered pans perfect for holiday meal sides. Used the tray without pans for keeping my pans hot for big family meal. Will use it thru the year, I know.
customer_reviews.author: p.karfunkle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and performed very well when we
customer_reviews.text: Product actually arrived earlier than told at checkout. Very nice product and performed very well when we used
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I was looking for and just like one that I own
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. It is exactly what I was looking for and just like one that I own. Easy to use and clean, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent heating
customer_reviews.text: Heating is very random, you have to have on highest setting for all three compartments to be warm. Farthest Bay from control will not even get warm sometimes
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get a great job, food hot but not dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer, low cost!
customer_reviews.text: I like this warmer and have used it both with the triple trays that come with it, and with just the flat plate warmer and regular serving dishes on it. Working great! I recommend it. I wish it included an option to buy larger portion double-trays in addition to the triple trays.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy J Syx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am looking forward to using it for the holiday's.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Evans

customer_reviews.title: I received the product on time and in great condition. I have only used the hot plate ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time and in great condition. I have only used the hot plate function once; it worked well and kept the food warm. I think it will be a useful appliance for our future family gatherings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I use it for regular meals to keep everything hot.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rotman

customer_reviews.title: It worked well, but a little reminder for everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well, but a little reminder for everyone who purchase this item. Be sure to pre-heat for 20 min
customer_reviews.author: mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but obviously very cheap thin metal
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed this is the second item in a row that has previously been opened & returned. Each item had dammage to the tray & was dented. Won’t be buying no 3. Good concept, but obviously very cheap thin metal. Be cautious & check carefully when opening.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The warming tray arrived slightly dented; the metal warming tray is admittedly cheap and flimsy, as others have pointed out in their reviews. However, I bought the set lightly used for 1/2 the price, and it is well worth it for the money. The dent doesn’t affect the heat distribution. The buffet gets warm pretty fast. The trays are of decent size for Thanksgiving/Christmas sides. A tray won’t hold a whole turkey, but it will hold 5lb of potatoes or stuffing and gravy for 20-30 ppl just fine. It may not be pretty, but it’s functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kate94

customer_reviews.title: Good Price as well as good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift but recipient was pleased with it and indicates they use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase and speed of delivery. Happy Holidays to all🎄
customer_reviews.author: andrea s.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great too. I had to return because of the size. Too small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NutriChef 3 Tray Buffet Server & Hot Plate Food Warmer | Tabletop Electric Food Warming Tray | Easy Clean Stainless Steel | Portable & Great for Parties & Events | Max Temp 175F | (PKBFWM33.V7)
product_meta.description:
The NutriChef Food Warmer Buffet Server provides convenient and hassle-free food prep ability. The tabletop design resembles a buffet warming hot plate featuring stainless steel construction and (3) removable sectional food serving containers. It's safe to use on any countertop or tabletop and ready to serve. The high-powered heating element allows your food to reach a maximum temperature of 175 degrees Fahrenheit.

Features:



 * Plug it In and Warm it Up!
 * 2-in-1 Appliance: Buffet Food Warming + Hot Plate
 * (3) Section Removable Food Serving Containers
 * Sectional Trays Remove from Warming Station
 * Simple 'Prep & Serve' for Any Occasion
 * Compact, Quick & Convenient
 * Rotary Control Temperature Setting
 * Easy-to-Clean & Stain Resistant Surface
 * Convenient Carry Handles
 * Safe for Any Countertop, Tabletop, Kitchen Top
 * Ultra Quiet Operation
 * Stainless Steel Construction



Technical Specs:



 * High-Powered Heating Element, 300 Watt
 * Reaches Maximum Temperature of 175 °F
 * Power Cord Length: 3.0' Feet
 * Power 120V, AC
 * Dimensions (L x W x H): 25.6'' x 15.0'' x 6.0''
 * Sold as: 1
 * Weight: 11.65 lbs.
feature_bullets: PREP & SERVE FOR ANY OCCASION: The 2-in-1 buffet server & hot plate is perfect for events where prepped food needs to be kept warm. Great for birthdays, holidays, graduations & dinner parties.

PLUG IT IN & WARM IT UP: The NutriChef electric food warmer is simple to use. Simply plug in the hot plate and put food into one of three separate removable serving trays. Covered trays keep food warmer longer & ready to hungry guests.

PORTABLE & COMPACT: The food warming tray is easy to transport with its convenient carry handles. Tabletop & countertop safe, the buffet has a 3-foot power cord for heating food in a variety of settings.

EASY TO USE: The buffet server set, made of stainless steel construction is both durable & practical. The ultra quiet operation & the 300 Watt heater makes prepping & serving food more of a treat than a chore.
ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROL: The buffet food warmer features a rotary control temperature setting, with a maximum temperature of 175F.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
